synopsis.text: Sho Akitsuki, a mysterious transfer student, arrives in the coastal town of Ouarai, Ibaraki, and captivates Masaki Hinaoka with his mesmerizing surfing skills. Masaki, a local middle school student, finds himself drawn to this thrilling sport despite his inability to swim. With Sho's guidance, Masaki discovers a hidden talent and passion for surfing, leading him on an exhilarating journey of self-discovery and friendship. Alongside his childhood friend Nalu, Masaki dives headfirst into the world of surfing, navigating the highs and lows of competition and the complexities of growing up. As the summer waves roll in, Masaki and his friends must confront their fears and embrace the challenges that lie ahead, all while forging unforgettable bonds in the pursuit of their dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
